workspacehopper.author: Noitidart
workspacehopper.description: Keyboard shortcut to jump to last focused tab or window.
workspacehopper.name: workspacehopper

preferences.description: A key must be pressed twice within this much time(ms) to be counted as a double key press
preferences.name: dblSpeed
preferences.title: Double Key Press Speed

preferences.description: Delay(ms) for a key to be held down before counting as held
preferences.name: holdTime
preferences.title: Hold Time

preferences.description: Hop to last tab or window, depending on what was last used
preferences.label: Set Key
preferences.name: hotkey_hopGlobal
preferences.title: Hop Global

preferences.description: If pressed when focused in a window without any tabs, it will hop to the last focused tab and its window
preferences.label: Set Key
preferences.name: hotkey_hopTabCurWin
preferences.title: Hop Tab in Current Window

preferences.description: Hop to last used window in focus history, even if a different tabs were used since focusing away from last window
preferences.label: Set Key
preferences.name: hotkey_hopWin
preferences.title: Hop Window
